title: STATE_VARIABLE
description: Variable that is updated by polling, and is regarded as correct as long as the last update occurred at or more recently than the required currency.
$comments: Defined in Definition IM, inherits from EXTERNAL_VARIABLE

name.description: Name of variable, as used in precondition and decision expressions.

populating_request.description: Optional specification of a system request that would populate a context variable.

required_currency.description: Required currency of data in target system (e.g. EHR) to be considered valid in the context of this Task.
